document_data.name: ''Sunstone Bullet''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Sunstone bullets''''' were a variety of [[enchanted]] [[bullet]]s that were crafted from [[Sunstone (gem)|sunstone]] [[gem]]s. They were were used as ammunition for certain ranged weapons such as [[sling]]s.
document_data.Powers: When these ''+1 bullets'' they struck a person, creature or object they detonated in a small burst of flames and scorched their target. They had a functional range of approximately 100' (30.5 m).
